TopicTitle: need help remembering a mod i used [Solved]

Articles.Content:

in the VAB you grab this certain tank and resize it in any shape even cone. also you had the choice of making the tank diferant colours including stainless steel (my favourite).

please if you can help, would be much appreaciated.

Sounds like you may be thinking of Procedural Parts but I don't use it, so am not sure. I bet whatever mod it is has "Procedural" in the name.

that rings a bell mate! thanks 5th!

...now i gotta see if its maintaind ;-/

/hopes
